text: Tsey khto zvynuvachuyutʹ usury ye u tiy zhe pozytsiyi yak tsiy prokontrolʹovaniy vplyvom chorta. Tse tomu, shcho vony zayavlyayutʹ shcho usury yavlyaye soboyu toy zhe samyy tomu shcho komertsiya. Ale, BOH dozvolyaye komertsiyu, ta zaboronyaye usury. Otzhe, whoever zvazhaye na tsyu zapovidʹ z yoho Lorda, ta utrymuyetʹsya vid usury, vin mozhe utrymaty yoho mynulyy zarobitok, ta yoho vyrok vidpochyvaye z BOHOM. Yak dlya tsykh khto nastiylyvo prodovzhuyutʹ usury, vony zaznayutʹ Pekla, prychomu vony perebuyutʹ zavzhdy
